overview:
Ryan Crowe is a social media strategist and theorist currently at Stealth Creative, a full-service creative ad agency located in St. Louis, Missouri.

Ryan is a social media blogger who is active in several online communities. He writes articles about social media and its place in the past, present and future. Ryan is most notably active in the Google+ community where he acts as an unofficial brand evangelist and works to provide tips and cultivate an environment that is unique to Google+ to his 243,000+ Circlers.

His 3rd party website (www.sociologyplus.com) hosts an extensive Google+ guide (written by fellow sociologis+, Johnathan Chung) and also a Google+ user art gallery in addition to social media/Google+ articles from Ryan and other members of the Google+ community.

Ryan has worked in several social media roles including social media management, community management and as a strategist to clients in fields ranging from international printing buyers to large market internet and cable providers. Ryan is also a startup enthusiast - and loves reaching out to startups to provide consultation and support. Currently, he works as the social media director for Listener Approved, where he also runs a blog dedicated to helping independent musicians use social media to promote their work.

Ryan received his Master’s degree in Russian and Slavonic Studies at the University of Missouri. He received his Bachelor’s in Russian and Slavic Studies and his BA in Theatrical performance at “Mizzou” as well.
